review: I chose this rating because I believed that this was a plug and play item; it is not. Check your router type before you buy because certain routers require troubleshooting and reconfiguration to work.  Google response was to contact my router manufacturer and the manufacturer was of limited help.  This would be great if it worked but the expectation of plug and play turned into days of trying troubleshoot and reconfigure my router.  Do your homework before you buy.

review: The Google Chromecast is a great streaming device for everyone who does not need to stream local data from their mobile devices or desktop. So basically, things like pictures, videos, or movies in your phone, tablet, or computer cannot be sent to the Google Chromecast. If people need that type of service, I would recommend an Apple TV. I would also recommend Apple TV as it now supports a lot of apps and streaming services.But for a small (yet still growing in numbers as developers decide to implement the Chromecast technology in their apps) number of app support and services such as Netflix, HuluPlus, Viki (Free Subscription), and YouTube, Google Chromecast is a great and cheap way to start media streaming to your TV.For more info on the Google Chromecast here is a helpful article I read provided in the following link:[...]
